::Whistler::
"Aye aye sir."  Whistler transforms from his sleek beastmode and adjusts two 
of his weapons (a pair of small shoulder mounted machine guns) to face 
forward (otherwise they act as shoulder guards).  He slips his hands into 
what were his short hind legs to increase his physical power (think brass 
knuckles).  Fully, if weakly armed he heads off into the woods at his right 
shouting "I've got this side, Rust, you check the other."
